p: In many cases, flies can be a significant problem in livestock breeding, so knowledge of the life cycles of these insects seems to be necessary for control on farms keeping pigs and other farm animals. Flies are common insects in farm buildings where animals are kept. These insects have access to contaminated materials such as dead pigs and secretions and excretions of diseased pigs, and therefore they can be an important risk factor in the spread of many infectious pig diseases ( 24, 33, 41).
